message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the proposed price. I would like to make a counteroffer of $750000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we're unable to match that price point. We would like to keep the discussion open and propose a counteroffer of $850000 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I will consider it, but I must stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $800000 for the product.
